entry.dcterms:title: Inter-Ethnic Relations in the Carpathian Basin 1997-2000. Hungarians from Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F10c: Inter-Ethnic Relations in the Carpathian Basin 1997-2000. Hungarians from Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Csepeli, György
Örkény, Antal
Székelyi, Mária
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Institute of Minority Research
Loránd Eötvös University Institute of Sociology and Social Policy
Hungarian Academy of Sciences Institute of Minority Research
entry.dcterms:description: social and political contents of consciousness - fears, anomie, experiences of injustice, satisfaction, perception of the situation of the respondents own country, Euro-Atlantic integrational expectations, authoritarianism; national identity - national feeling, political and cultural national identity, ethnocentrism, national auto- and heterostereotypes, morality; majority-minority relationship- social distance (Bogardus scale), xenophobia, social networks, conflicts
